components.name: App
components.description: Main application component for the Corp-analyst application. Handles overall UI structure, state management, and user interactions.
components.props_interface: None (no props as it's the root component)

components.name: Section
components.description: Helper component for collapsible sections in the UI.
components.props_interface: SectionProps (title, children, isExpanded, onToggle, isDarkMode, isCyberpunk)
